N = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0

for i in a:
    while i % 2 == 0 and i != 0:
        i //= 2
        count += 1

print(count)


N = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
count = 0
for i in a:
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2
        count += 1

print(count)
# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc169/tasks/abc169_b


import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
A = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

# solve
ans = 0
for i in range(N):
    while A[i] % 2 == 0:
        A[i] /= 2
        ans += 1

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/python3

N = int(input())
A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

count = 0

for i in A:
    while i % 2 == 0:
        i /= 2
        count += 1

print(count)
